The stylish fifth-generation Honda CR-V shares your spirit of adventure, and gives you the freedom and flexibility to explore the
world around you. The fluid lines of the CR-V were designed not only
to create a sleek and dynamic look, but also to assist performance by channeling airflow, resulting in improved fuel economy. The chrome garnish and rear skid plate provide the CR-V with an individual and purposeful look, while the door mirrors’ curved edges harmonies with the overall design, reducing blind spots around the car. The dramatic window design provides superb all-round visibility and makes it a pleasure to be seen in.
